website_summaries.verdict: Best for players with shorter arms, this aluminum tank isn't as light as carbon fiber tanks, but it's a reasonable size and weight.
pros: Good for use with a remote line
Adjustable low, medium and high pressure
cons: The nozzle is a bit short and can be difficult to attach to the air line

customer_reviews.title: Great tanks... used with Tippmann 98
customer_reviews.text: I own quite a few Tippmann 98 Custom guns and bought two of these to test out. I really like these tanks. They maintain the pressure as you would expect, they are not OVERLY heavy and they handle the beating I give them just fine. I suggest this tank to anyone looking for an all-around good rental-type tank. Again I used this on two Tippmann 98 Custom guns and they worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great tank
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t want to get something cheap; when it comes to an air tank, you’ve got to go for quality or it won’t last. It’s perfect; on the heavier side, but it IS a big aluminum tank. Great for you average jack-of-all trades filthy casual paint baller like myself, not too expensive but still high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Archangel

customer_reviews.title: You may get an older tank.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t have bought this if I knew I’d be receiving a tank that’s over 2 years old and will require a hydro test sooner rather than later. Mine is stamped with 07 / 16 on it, so be mindful of just how long these have sat around. Hugely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mapkar

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Tank
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful tank by ninja and made in America for a good price. The regulator is one of the best ones I've ever seen on a tank and keeps my guns shooting at consistent preasure/velocity. The tank is a bit heavy and feels about 4pounds with air but I have not actually weighed this on a scale. To compare it feels almost twice as heavy as my 20oz CO2 tanks and is a bit heavier than my 68ci/4500psi Nitro tank. Overall I love this tank and will be using this for a long time. All future tanks I get will also be from Ninja. Great stuff guys! xD
customer_reviews.author: John M. Harkey

customer_reviews.title: Good aluminum tank
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have stated this is a solid HPA tank. I have been using it for about 3 weeks now, both at a field and in the woods behind my house. And it does the job. I have refilled it about 20 times so far with no leaks or problems. PROS: Solid, no problems, thus far. Regulator consistent. CONS: Weight, it's pretty heavy both full as well as empty. SUMMARY: decent priced tank, low cost, durable. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Big B

customer_reviews.title: Good tank for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great value for what you're getting. I'm glad they have these now which are a nice option to the expensive carbon fiber tanks. Obviously the trade off is weight. Still as long as you're not expecting something feather light its pretty nice. Remote rig pretty much essential due to the extra weight but they aren't that expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Squirrel

customer_reviews.title: Great, kinda heavy, but worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I love this tank but it’s not very light which is kinda a given. It’s perfect for beginners or if you just need a cheap air tank.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good tank
customer_reviews.text: This is a good tank and have refilled a couple times already although it is a bit heavy. Yes, some of the comments are correct that the tank could be from Zephyr. I had the same problem too but I returned it. I believe if you order from Amazon rather than Amazon fulfilled by Zephyr or Zephyr with Prime shipping, you should be fine. Hope this will save you some time and when you are in a hurry to order a tank.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Solid tank!
customer_reviews.text: good starter tank for kids. BUT if youre planning to play speedball alot then you need to spend the extra money and get a carbon fiber tank. SOOO much lighter.

customer_reviews.title: great bottle with free 2 day PRIME delivery
customer_reviews.text: Great tank, stylish and works perfectly. About the same weight as a 20oz CO2 when both full. The Aluminum bottle most likely keeps it light and I have never used a steel 48ci to compare but I keep mine in a harness w/remote so it doesn't matter. I'm giving this one to my son and I just bought the 62ci version yesterday for myself. I did call Ninja's tech support with a question and they were very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: RPriz

customer_reviews.title: Unleash the Ninja within you
customer_reviews.text: I love the tank. It's a bit heavy but c'mon lets face it... when this bad boy is attached to your gun, the NINJA within you takes control of your body, trigger finger, and marker. LOL but seriously, this is a great tank for less than $100.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with the purchase so far
customer_reviews.text: legit working tank and recently manufactured, I'm happy with the purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Powell

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine.
customer_reviews.text: The price is about what you should pay for this tank. I've seen it priced more and less at some places. It works well, and I haven't had any issues with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad tank. Its just kinda small
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad tank. Its just kinda small. Usually had to refill after two games or so. I upgraded to a 77/4500 SL Ninja tank with V2 reg. This tank is a bit heavier than my new tank but at 1/5 the price its not at all that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Pete L.

customer_reviews.title: (48ci) Its a little heavy but holds a decent amount ...
customer_reviews.text: (48ci) Its a little heavy but holds a decent amount of air for several games depending on your marker. Its definitely something you will need to run a remote line with.
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: Ninja Regulator, Zephyr Branded Tank
customer_reviews.text: It looks like they are updating thier picture now, but like other have said, it has a Ninja Reg, and Zephyr just branded the tank. Doesn't really matter. Good tank, used all day, no problems, high quality paint job and sexy regulator and gauge.
customer_reviews.author: MrrQuackers

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is a seemingly great tank for a reasonable price. With the included adjustable regulator, it's an even better deal. Instructions for adjusting the regulator pressure could be a bit better, but a short 2 minute youtube video took care of this. It's actually quite easy once you see it done.
customer_reviews.author: acruxksa

customer_reviews.title: works great and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my nephews pump, works great and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: C. Chen

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: This thing is super heavy, but it does what it is supposed to. I will attach a remote line to it soon to save my elbow from strain.
customer_reviews.author: erictheelephant

customer_reviews.title: Great tank, great reg.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and works as it should. Mine had a shelf time of just 2 months, SUPER FRESH! Thanks Ninja!
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Halvorsen

customer_reviews.title: Product as described.. 1st time using HPA
customer_reviews.text: The tank is a bit heavier than CO2, but the performance in cold weather was great. It's easy to fill and you don't have to detach it from the marker. I also bought it b/c it's made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this purchase. He uses it for paint balling.
customer_reviews.author: Yavapai

customer_reviews.title: High quality tank/reg
customer_reviews.text: As far as aluminum bottles go and from my experience with several different brands Ninja seems to make some of the higher quality hpa tanks.
customer_reviews.author: MadMax209

customer_reviews.title: Great tank
customer_reviews.text: Good tank for the price. Seems to be built well and isn't too heavy to attach to your gun. Ive only used it for a few games but love it over CO2.
customer_reviews.author: Jf

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: this is a good thing for the money. I have used it many times and have had no problem. I have used it only gun and with a remote line. Works fine.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice and works well
customer_reviews.text: Everything has worked well and the look is nice i would buy more of these matter of fact i am going to buy one more ,i like the power i get out of hpa but only get a 1/3 of the shots ,but it is only 6 bucks the fill my scuba tanks os you have good and bad
customer_reviews.author: L. ODELL

customer_reviews.title: Came in perfect condition and working right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: After ordering 2 Empire tanks, which both were received defective, I got this as a replacement for one of them. Came in perfect condition and working right out of the box. Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Gib Shay

customer_reviews.title: Good tank for the budget player...
customer_reviews.text: Bought three of these for markers that I let my friends use. Much less of the cost of lighter tanks but still give the same performance.
customer_reviews.author: Chafner_0711

customer_reviews.title: Great tank!
customer_reviews.text: Great tank! I used this for my latest tournament and it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sydni

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I had noticed it leaking air after I had filled it the second time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: i havent had any problems and i used it twice so far. fit well with my spyder and slightly cheaper then in stores.
customer_reviews.author: cassandra davis

customer_reviews.title: So great I bought Two
customer_reviews.text: These tanks work really well and have not had any problems. Only minor complaint is that they fill a little slower than other ones do.
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: For what it needs to be and do it was great. Arrived in timely fashion and in goos shape. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Project Firestart

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff! item was just as described by vendor and works just as it should would un questionably buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff! item was just as described by vendor and works just as it should would un questionably buy again!
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have this one and an Empire one but I use this one more. I would definitely recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: randomyz

customer_reviews.title: HPA Tank - great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Works great - no problems. Lighter than I expected We bought three and all have worked great with three different markers
customer_reviews.author: Steven Meade

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good packaging and fast shipping. Recent hydro date and good regulator. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KnowsEnoughToBeTrouble

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money make your shots more consistent and last ...
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money make your shots more consistent and last way longer... I could go on and on but you get the point
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good tank
customer_reviews.text: Great tank, comes with everything you need, and isn't the heaviest tank out there!
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Southworth

customer_reviews.title: Nice tank
customer_reviews.text: This tank is awesome and feels like its well made. I like almost everything about it. The only reason i gave it a 4 is because its a little heavy and it seemed to empty really fast (That may have been because i had my velocity set really high). But either way i would definitely recommend this tank to anyone. The gauge is nice too, never had a tank with one before.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: it is what it is
customer_reviews.text: Not a lot to say about this tank it is what it is does what they say and that is cool by me. GOOD $
customer_reviews.author: BULLET

customer_reviews.title: Nice air tank
customer_reviews.text: Pretty lightweight, holds a decent amount of air. I had a barrel leak, but I got around 400 shots out a fill.
customer_reviews.author: Francis P.

customer_reviews.title: Ninja Aluminum N2 Paintball tank 48ci 3000psi
customer_reviews.text: Great tank for the price. I'm an avid paintball player that plays about a half a dozen times a year. Cant see spending 3 times the price for a carbon fiber tank right now. Definately a better option than Co2. Like that this tank has a really nice pressure gauge that's very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Ninja tank are awesome and look cool....Great tanks I highly recommend one..just by it on its own cause waves to go sells packs but they dont send this tank with it....they say they will though...just dont...
customer_reviews.author: Daniell

customer_reviews.title: Ninja Tank 48ci-3000psi
customer_reviews.text: Ninja makes great tanks period the only thing I have aginst this tank is how very heavy the tank is heavier then my 20oz CO2 tank filled up. If you don't care about that then get if but if you are looking to buy something good and not heavy you are going to have to invest more money and buy a carbon fiber one.
customer_reviews.author: Jedi Knight77

customer_reviews.title: Great tank overall
customer_reviews.text: Great tank only downfall is its heavy but overall great I suggest you get it it's more accurate and shoots farther than co2
customer_reviews.author: Dennis L Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Good tank
customer_reviews.text: This tank is good, comes with cap for the screw on, and its good for vest, or anything that it can go on with, also works with coil. Little heavy, but coil solves that.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this tank! I read some reviews saying that their tank didn't say Ninja. Mine did. It was packaged nice and was shipped very fast. Overall, I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Fmp4711

customer_reviews.title: heavy. good upgrade for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The tank is very heavy. It is good for people that want to upgrade from CO2, but don't want to pay a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Reggie

customer_reviews.title: Nice bottle for the price
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars but this bottle at least mine is a slow fill....Its slow enough that the guys at the park sometimes tell me its full while im watching the needle move up really slow...

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tank made in the USA. Perfect if you don't want to spend a lot of money on tanks.
customer_reviews.author: J. Arroyo

customer_reviews.title: My thoughts
customer_reviews.text: I love the tank as my first paintball hpa tank and it was a little on the heavy side but i just sucked it up and i love the ninja regulator
customer_reviews.author: Christina Henyon

customer_reviews.title: Nice Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Good Tank , not heavy and can shoot more times than my standard tank
customer_reviews.author: Paul Jones

customer_reviews.title: good tank
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality tank from what I can tell the only down side its its a little heavier than it shoudl be
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: still great tank
customer_reviews.text: 3 months of ownership the top threads stripped. still great tank though
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: OMG <3
customer_reviews.text: Its made in the U.S!! it feels like it can survive an explosion!!! its realy solid and add pain to your gun >:D
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a no brainer, decent tank, nice regulator... WIN WIN. I have already filled it up 3-4 times with no issues, working great.
customer_reviews.author: smmcinto

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: A very nice tank!!! Definitely recommend and great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan nace

customer_reviews.title: But for the price it's a pretty decent tank
customer_reviews.text: It's Aluminum which equals weight so that's why its 3 star. But for the price it's a pretty decent tank. I had no problems with this tank when used as a backup.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Nice tank, better price. Would have given 5 stars, however it's pretty heavy. I feel it could be slightly lighter. All in all, my son isn't concerned and a happy kid!! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: jm_kristy

customer_reviews.title: High quality and extra's
customer_reviews.text: This air tank is great. It shipped very fast. When you get it, the box has the air tank, a very detailed instruction manual, allen wrench, some special screw remover, a fill nipple cover which is important and a thread protector. The air tank is made in the USA and it is very well made it has a cool red o-ring too if your using co2 this is much better. Its is kind of heavy though. I got the ninja metal thread protector which is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Skeptic

customer_reviews.title: Ninja N2
customer_reviews.text: Received a while back, when I started playing it for the first time. Very good, does what it suppose to. But when I played paintball for a second time. the tip of the tank went lose (leaking air) cost me 20 bucks to fix it up.
customer_reviews.author: huy

customer_reviews.title: The regulator nipple on my tank is shaped weirdly and ...
customer_reviews.text: The regulator nipple on my tank is shaped weirdly and doesn't fit the main air pump at my field, so they have to bring it to the back of the store for the special pump. It's time consuming and embarrassing but I can't afford another tank. I assume mine came defective, my friends with Ninja 48/3s don't share this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made. A little heavy for my 50 cal
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made.A little heavy for my 50 cal,but I'll just use a cord and wear it on my back.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used it once and worked perfectly. Need to reload with gas.
customer_reviews.author: micah

customer_reviews.title: Ninja 48/3k
customer_reviews.text: Of course with the preferred carbon fiber tanks now a days, for the price this tank cannot be beat. Personally for aluminum tanks, I like to run a remote line to my marker from a tank pouch so that way the weight of the tank is not added to your maker already. If carbon fiber is out of the question due to price, then these tanks are a good fall back for the baller on a budget. Plus it's ninja and made in the usa. haha.
customer_reviews.author: Fou

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Heavy tank. I wonder if it is really made of Aluminum.
customer_reviews.author: SN2000

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: Much better than a Gorilla tank. It has 2 orings!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne J.

customer_reviews.title: Did NOT Receive 'Ninja' Tank, Regulator was Correct
customer_reviews.text: Took off a star for the misleading information. The tank I received featured a "Zephyr Sports" logo and not the "Ninja" logo as see in the product images. The regulator was of "Ninja" make. However despite this, the HPA tank is a great buy, and easily stands up to any other tank I have owned. I would reccomend this purchase unless you really want a Ninja branded tank. I know some buyers have received this, but I along with some others have not so use caution when ordering. Regardless of what you receive however I believe this is a quality buy. MUCH better than using C02.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Szoke

customer_reviews.title: Alright
customer_reviews.text: this tank is an OK tank. i would buy the 68 ci tank instead of this one. great brand. cool tank. just didn't really favor it
customer_reviews.author: Jake Thomas

customer_reviews.title: I cant see the born date on the tank has ...
customer_reviews.text: I cant see the born date on the tank has to much paint and the dots cant be seen so idk men ill go to the paintball field on the weekend and find out there..
customer_reviews.author: HITMAN

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice tank fit perfect on my 98 custom but this ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice tank fit perfect on my 98 custom but this is not the lightweight tank this one is pretty heavy and will weigh your gun down a bit
customer_reviews.author: Francisco

customer_reviews.title: It's HPA
customer_reviews.text: This is way better than Co2, the air is easier to fill up and a lot more accurate than Co2. I chose ninja because it was made in the USA, Go America!
customer_reviews.author: pots and pans

customer_reviews.title: Zypher Tank / Ninja Regulator
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased this tank for my milsim marker and is going to be on a remote line to my vest. I know it won't matter since the vest will cover it but the tank has " Zeypher Sports" across the side of the tank (not ninja like the picture shows). The tank has a certified Ninja regulator which is the important part but it was just discouraging to not get what I saw in the picture. If you wanted a trusted ALL Ninja tank, beware!
customer_reviews.author: Buzz

product_meta.title: Ninja 48/3k Aluminum HPA Paintball Tank Black
product_meta.description: The Ninja Paintball 5 Year HPA Tank is made in the USA and is ideal for scenario play or spare air. The SRT piston produces an industry leading recharge rate and virtually eliminates reg shoot down. Every regulator is hand crafted and factory tested and is rebuildable by the user. Features: Gives you 500 shots per fill depending on marker Made in the USA SRT piston –Sonic Recharge Technology piston – plated aluminum piston that produces an industry leading recharge rate and virtually eliminates reg shoot down SPA – Shim Pressure Adjustment- change output pressure by adding or removing shims, not springs or pistons MFV – Mini Fill Valve – Non wrist digging, low profile design fill valve All black tactical look Brass or optional Aluminum bonnet - see regulator parts for details Meets all DOT, CGA and ASTM specifications Completely rebuildable by the user Every regulator is hand crafted and factory tested Super low response curve 0-50 psi from full to empty ASTM COMPLIANT bonnet thread ASTM COMPLIANT DOT burst disc ASTM COMPLIANT Low pressure burst disk ASTM COMPLIANT Restrictor, bleed hole and safety groove Mini Fill Valve IS hardened, plated 5000 psi rated Reg installed to ASTM specifications D.O.T. Approved Aluminum bottle 5 year hydro 2.82 pounds!!!! 10 1/2 inches long x 3 5/8 inches diameter 1 3/8 inches bottle to ASA
feature_bullets: Adjustable from Low, Medium, or High Pressure
